name: just another zombie game
description:
(download available on bottom, some problems may occur with webGL)

!DISCLAIMER: i started game dev 2 weeks ago, this "game" is more of an idea and experiment for me, passion project as well. I also started pixel art 2 weeks ago, so all the assets and art in  the game was made by me (if that wasn't obvious).  

(*PS: press W on the highlighted "doors" to enter them)

There is a few things that i want to implement (so you know that am not oblivious to the many flaws of the game):

Save / Load- yae, the game resets every time you enter and exits a scene, currently writing scripts for that, the brackeys tutorial was ineffective for my knowledge of C Sharp (basically i am for stupid for that)

A Plot- the plot is supposed to be that you have to kill humans before a timer (the spinal fluid thing) runs out, right now you can press space and the timer goes down.

Level Design and more enemies in specific levels- its empty yes.

And here are some other shit i may or may not implement:
